Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: evanlolz
Reviews.Content: firstly, the shipping was incredible. I ordered it at 5PM on a thursday, and it shipped the next day, I had it in my hands on that Monday. And i did not opt for anything more than the original shipping speed (3-5 days). Perfect.The phone is great. It seems to be a latin america model, but it works flawlessly on AT&T.; Just make sure you have a micro SIM card (or cut your full sized one). I am able to use 4G on ATT (NOT LTE, the HSPA+).This phone is so far excellent, and everything has gone smooth. The best part? No bloatware from AT&T;, and everyone wondering how you got a Droid Razr on that network instead of Verizon.UPDATE 7/5/12 -Okay, so when I got the phone, there was news of an ICS upgrade coming out. Well, lucky for me, I happened to get a RAZR from Puerto Rico (it was in English and was unlocked, of course) but the update wasn't coming through. I had to jump through hoops to get ICS installed on it, even go as far as changing the system version from the Puerto Rican version to one from Brazil so I could get ICS on it.I am not sure how OTA updates work for this phone, so I did it manually. It was a giant pain, but it did work smoothly, and I am finally on Android 4.0.4.Case in point - excellent phone, but if you want to upgrade the stock 2.3.5 that it comes with, it will require some technical knowledge to do. Besides this, I am loving the phone.

Reviews.Title: motorola razr
Reviews.Author: qcromwell
Reviews.Content: I have the razr to be a very nice phone. it was unlocked and as soon as my sim was place in it t-mobile service was up and running. The shipping was excellent and the phone was package great. The feature of the phone are easy to use.  the battery life has been very good so far.  the touch screen responds quickly.Only cons is sometime it take a few extra seconds for programs to load but I believe this is because I have too many apps running at the same time. Quality of the sound on the phone is excellent also.  The slim design and clear screen graphics makes this phone a excellent buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love Android
Reviews.Author: Brennan Hamilton
Reviews.Content: Made the switch a little over a year ago and love them. Started off with HTC Inspire, now I'm using the RAZR. This is a gsm version so it'll work with any SIM card. Stock there's a pretty polished UI and the camera takes awesome photos and movies, SmartActions is pretty cool too. The phone is definitely splash proof and resistant to scratches. Also if you root your phone note that this is from Malaysia, so if you want to download fastboot files look for Malaysia as the region. I'm using MIUI and I'd say the dual core processor does just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: slazo
Reviews.Content: I find this phone easy to use as i had a motorola defyx previous to it. The speed difference is uncanny/! The 8gb internal memory is useful, but I also have a 32gb sd which provides extra space for music.

Reviews.Title: Razor
Reviews.Author: Rad
Reviews.Content: Battery die super fast and for a GSM its always on the Edge network which mean internet is S L O W

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Fellows "LivinDueSouth67"
Reviews.Content: I had read the reviews before buying.  I was looking for a spare Android phone to.work with ATT network.  It is difficult finding unlocked 3G smartphone that accepts a micro SIM card.  I have owned many Motorola phones and.have been satisfied with this phone.  I feel that the price could have been better.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: Rod
Reviews.Content: I do not like this phone the battery is fatal and its so slow  dont like it at all k

Reviews.Title: YES
Reviews.Author: S. K.
Reviews.Content: There are not enough words to express my HAPPINESS with this phone.1. It's works around the world - truly unlocked2. Very Tough - fell a couple of times - still like new. Water - no problem.3. Great inside and out - never had problems with it4. Big screen - small computer5. It's not like the pic, it's overall black with white border - Love itI would advice you to buy a case and screen protector to protect your gem.I have used for over an year and a half, and I love it.

Reviews.Title: love this phone
Reviews.Author: shelby
Reviews.Content: this phone has a bit of a learning curve to it but I was able to figure it out pretty quickly. I love it now.

Reviews.Title: Would have been great??
Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: I would have really loved this product, I think, but never had a chance to use it because it did not come unlocked.  After wrangling with the seller for too long, I returned it.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Very good after 2 months using my new 4G Droid Razr.Picture is good, colors and graphics are excellent compare to Sam Sung

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto En Buenas Condiciones Compra Dede Vzla
Reviews.Author: Jose Prieto
Reviews.Content: Buenas, el producto me llego en buenas condicion y como lo esperaba! muy buena atencion! es una excelente marca! !

Reviews.Title: Motorola Razr
Reviews.Author: sid
Reviews.Content: I do not have a mini sim yet , so I only did a short call to check it works , was ok .all the rest , so far so good , all internet apps seems ok .Actually seems like a great phone .Only problem is that the rom is a French  rom , and so it does not have hebre and so far I could not install a new one ...

Reviews.Title: Perfect device for personal use
Reviews.Author: Sanjeev Mittal
Reviews.Content: I have been using for more than 2 weeks and its an excellent phone. It has Android 4.0, ICS version. Camera is probably not the best around but rest everything is A class. For less than 400 USD, its the best in the market I think.

Reviews.Title: good device
Reviews.Author: Harold Castro
Reviews.Content: I like this phone. I live in Colombia and it works perfectly. But I had to manually update to ics. The android version it comes with stinks. It rebooted every 20 minutes or so. The update was smooth and I didn't lose any data. I'm happy with it, but a better battery will be appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Amazing phon Motorola XT910
Reviews.Author: David Diaz Xray
Reviews.Content: Im write now this short review in my motorola razr xt 910, I love this phone, very nice cam Hd 1080, really speed software (yet android 2.3 but can upgrade for ice cream 4.x) Have all thas I want, my email for enterprise way exchange and cool interface in galery images with facebook images in real time. Whats App function perfectly. Im connect a Jabra stone bluetooht and function very well, interface simple and zero noise. Is a nice phone, very slim, better price!! Amazon, how ever, good!

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone, screen not too much
Reviews.Author: Montserrat Falcon Cadena
Reviews.Content: It is in fact a very nice phone, but the screen its way too fragil, I had it for to weeks and the screen just broke, bad luck for me because the replacement cost aroung 250 so you need to be veeeeeery careful with this...

SERVES NO. Is a phone that is damaged so my expectations were wrong, because you trust that good and not selling goods with defects as the phone came.I'm really decepcionalda of purchasing this phone with you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Arlex
Reviews.Content: this phone is awesome, really amazing, the glass is resistable and everything works on it great, i enjoyed it and recommend this phone to everyone

Reviews.Title: motorola
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: i love it  soooooooooo sooo so so so so so so so so so so so so so so s

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT IT SUPPOSED TO BE!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was supposed to be a 16GB storage phone, well i got an 8GB phone, and there's a malfunction on the 4 bottom navigation buttons they fail to turn on every time you touch them... BUT the BIGGEST FLAW its the battery, it barely makes it through the day,it lasts no more than 12hrs with moderate use (occasional FB Log in and whatsapp texting)i also own a Galaxy S2 and with the same use i can get up to 18 to 20hrs... i'm starting to think they sent me a used phone since every time or reset it to factory settings (which i did a couple of times already to see if i saw any improvements) its in Italian as default language...So i wouldn't recommend ti

ProductInfo.Features:
MicroSIM. Network: GSM/GPRS/EDGE 850/900/1800/1900 MHz; 3G/HSPA 2100/1900/900/850 Mhz. Operating System: Android Gingerbread 2.3.5. Processor: 1.2GHz Dual Core, TI OMAP 4430 (Upgradable to Ice Cream Sandwich (Android 4.0). 1GB Ram Memory
4.3" Super-AMOLED Advanced display - Highest Resolution Super Vibrant Display - Super AMOLED advanced with a higher resolution 256ppi screen with 25% more power efficient panel
Super-thin smartphone, featuring splash-guard coating, Kevlar and Corning Gorilla Glass for extra protection
8MP Camera with 1080p video recording, Front facing camera. MotoCast - Wireless streaming of media from a pc to your phone. Smart Actions for efficient task completion.
1780mAh battery Lithium Polymer. Talk Time - Up to 450 mins GSM, Standby - Up to 250 hours GSM
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola XT910 DROID RAZR Unlocked GSM Smartphone with 8 MP Camera, Android OS, Wi-Fi, and GPS - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - White
